title: 50,000 Litro Gas cylinders released on Thursday (2)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that it has scheduled to distribute 50,000 domestic gas cylinders on Thursday (2).
Accordingly, 12.5kg, 5kg, and 2.3kg gas cylinders can be purchased at dealerships.
However, people were still queuing up since last night to purchase gas.
Sri Lanka: Indian PM agreed to deliver fertilizer for Yala season, says President
